about_the_game:
Welcome to DYSARMIA. In this RPG you play as Astrid and Phoenix, two lovebirds who are separated by a meteor throwing them both on to the opposite person’s home planet. Your goal is to find the scattered bridge pieces to help bring our lovers back together. You will fight monsters, pets, and unidentified life forms in order to connect the bridge between the two back together.

features:

Talk to people in order to unlock clues to where the bridge piece is.
Dodge enemy attacks in an open world and fight back with your weapon.
Original art and soundtrack brimming with personality.
Character-rich cutscenes with a lot of personality.
Created by a team of four.
Escape.
Cats.
Talking Cats.
Bats and Scorpions.
Save your progress and come back later.
Survive, run away if you have to.

content_descriptors.notes: There are mature parts of our game including profanity and a smoking cat. We do not intend to glorify use of profanity or drugs. It is simply part of the setting of the game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13.6 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU (AMD GCN-based GPU or newer, NVIDIA Kepler-based GPU or newer, Intel HD 4000 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
